org.mule.modules.salesforce.apex.util

Class ApexWSDLDownloaderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mule.modules.salesforce.apex.util.ApexWSDLDownloaderService

  • public class ApexWSDLDownloaderService
extends Object
    Service class responsible of downloading WSDL files for apex components.
    Author:
    MuleSoft, Inc.

    • Method Detail

      • downloadWSDLForApexClass

        public URI downloadWSDLForApexClass(String serviceEndpoint,
                           String apexClassName,
                           String sessionId,
                           String tempDir,
                           String proxyHost,
                           Integer proxyPort,
                           String proxyUsername,
                           String proxyPassword,
                           Integer connectionTimeout,
                           Integer readTimeout)
                             throws SalesforceException
        Download wsdl file for given apex class name, saves it to given temp dir and returns URL to saved file.
        Parameters:
        serviceEndpoint - - service endpoint responsible of handling requests
        apexClassName - - apex class name for which to download WSDL
        sessionId - - authentication session id
        tempDir - - temporary dir where to save downloaded file
        proxyHost - - proxy host
        proxyPort - - proxy port
        proxyUsername - - proxy username
        proxyPassword - - proxy password
        connectionTimeout - - connection timeout
        readTimeout - - read timeout
        Returns:
        url to saved file
        Throws:
        SalesforceException - in case that something goes wrong
